attributes.action: make Strangford Lough the United Kindom's first National Marine Park
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Strangford Lough in Northern Ireland is a vast inland sea and the largest tidal salt water lough in this country. The world wild life fund say it is one of the most important wild places in Europe, there over 2,000 marine species,it's habitat needs to be protected from exploitation and commercial pressure, before this unique and beautiful fragile eco-system is destroyed and lost forever.
